mean_cn: vt. 交换，互换，交流；  vi. 交换，替换，进行易货贸易；  n. 交易，交换，交易所，兑换
mean_en: an occurrence in which people give things of similar value to each other; the act of giving or taking one thing in return for another thing
word_etyma: ex出 + change交换 → exchange 交换
sentence: This is a good place for us to exchange ideas.
sentence_trans: 这是个不错的地方让我们交换想法。
